RentalCarEnrgyUse.name: RentalCarEnrgyUse
RentalCarEnrgyUse.description: Represents the energy consumption related to rental cars.

CarbonFootprintReportDate.description: The date when the carbon footprint data of the associated stationary asset is due to be sent to a reporting body.

Ch4EmissionsInKg.description: The CH4 emissions that are calculated for this energy use record.

Co2EmissionsInKg.description: The CO2 emissions that are calculated for this energy use record.

CostCenter.description: The cost center associated with this energy use record.

Distance.description: The distance travelled by the rental car.

DistanceUnit.description: The unit of measure for the distance travelled.

EndDate.description: The date until when the values of this energy use record are valid.

FuelEfficiencyInLkm.description: The fuel efficiency of the vehicle in liters for every 100 kilometers that's calculated based on the selected emission factors.

FuelEfficiencyInMpg.description: The fuel efficiency of the vehicle in miles per gallon that's calculated based on the selected emission factors.

FuelType.description: The type of fuel consumed for this energy use record.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates whether the rental car energy use record is locked for editing because the associated carbon footprint is locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

N2oEmissionsInKg.description: The N2O emissions that are calculated for this energy use record.

Name.description: The name for this energy use record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

RentalCarCompanyCode.description: The code that identifies the rental car company.

RentalCarCompanyName.description: The name of the rental car company.

RentalCarEmssnFctrId.description: The reference data that contains the rental car emission factors necessary to complete the calculations.

Scope3CrbnFtprntId.description: The scope 3 carbon footprint record that's associated with this energy use record.

Scope3EmissionsInTco2e.description: The total scope 3 emissions in metric tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent.

Scope3EmssnSrcId.description: The scope 3 emission source that's associated with this energy use record.

Scope3GhgCategory.description: Specifies the scope 3 GHG category for the total scope 3 emissions related to the energy use.

StartDate.description: The date from when the values of this energy use record are valid.

SuplScope3Emissions.description: The supplemental scope 3 emissions value thatâ€™s added to the calculated total scope 3 emissions value.

SupplierId.description: The supplier related to this record.

TotalFuelConsumptionInGal.description: The total fuel consumed in gallons.

TotalFuelConsumptionInLiter.description: The fuel consumption and the fuel consumption unit are prioritized over the aircraft fuel economy value and the aircraft fuel economy unit when calculating this value.

VendorProvidedEmissionsInTco2e.description: The scope 3 emissions provided by the vendor for the rental car booking or the aggregate details for multiple bookings. This emissions value overrides the calculated total scope 3 emissions.
